Song.title: In You Alone
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Mark Altrogge Â© 2000 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: This [Am]storm-tossed heart{,} has f[Am/G]in'lly found a h[F | F]arbor, In [Am]You my heart has f[Am/G]in'lly found its h[F | F]ome And [Am]You will be my dw[Am/G]elling place{,} for[F]ever, O my L[C/E]ord My sh[Dm7]ade and shelter, [F] [ ]and my s[G | Gsus4 |]ong
Chorus: In [G]You a[C]lone my h[F]eart re[Am]joices In [G]You a[C]lone is al[F]l de[G]light In [G]You a[C]lone is al[F]l my [Am]gladness In [F]You alone my s[Am]oul is satisf[G C | G]ied, [ ]s[C |]atis[G C |]fied [G] [ ]In You alo[||: C Bb/C | C Bb/C | Fmaj7 Bb/F | Fmaj7 Bb/F :||]ne
Verse 2: This [Am]wand'ring heart{,} has c[Am/G]ome back to its Sh[F | F]epherd My [Am]wand'ring heart{,} by p[Am/G]recious blood is h[F | F]ealed Oh [Am]sing the mercies{,} [Am/G]of our mighty S[F]avior{,} and our K[C/E]ing Great l[Dm7]ove of God, [F] [ ]in flesh reve[G | Gsus4 |]aled
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 this stormtossed heart has finlly found a harbor in you my heart has finlly found its home and you will be my dwelling place forever o my lord my shade and shelter and my song chorus in you alone my heart rejoices in you alone is all delight in you alone is all my gladness in you alone my soul is satisfied satisfied in you alone verse 2 this wandring heart has come back to its shepherd my wandring heart by precious blood is healed oh sing the mercies of our mighty savior and our king great love of god in flesh revealed
